hints.label: thm-stage1-mean-field
hints.title: Stage 1 Target: Hypocoercive LSI for Mean-Field Langevin
hints.content:
226: :label: thm-stage1-mean-field
227: 
228: For the above mean-field kinetic PDE, there exists $\alpha_{\text{kin}} > 0$ such that:
229: 
230: $$
231: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_{\text{MB}}) \le \frac{1}{\alpha_{\text{kin}}} I_{\text{kin}}[\rho | \rho_{\text{MB}}]
232: $$
233: 
234: where $\rho_{\text{MB}} \propto e^{-U(x) - |v|^2/(2T)}$ is the Maxwell-Boltzmann equilibrium and $I_{\text{kin}}$ is the entropy production.

hints.title: Stage 2 Target: Mean-Field Backbone KL-Convergence
hints.content:
282: :label: thm-stage2-mean-field
283: 
284: For the non-adaptive mean-field Euclidean Gas, there exists $\alpha_{\text{backbone}} > 0$ such that:
285: 
286: $$
287: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_t \| \rho_{\infty,0}) \le D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_0 \| \rho_{\infty,0}) \cdot e^{-\alpha_{\text{backbone}} t}
288: $$

hints.label: lem-revival-kl-contraction
hints.title: KL-Contraction of Revival Operator (Conjectured)
hints.content:
312: :label: lem-revival-kl-contraction
313: 
314: The revival operator $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ satisfies:
315: 
316: $$
317: D_{\text{KL}}(\mathcal{R}(\rho) \| \mathcal{R}(\sigma)) \le D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \sigma)
318: $$

hints.label: thm-composition-kl
hints.title: Discrete-Time KL-Contraction for Composition
hints.content:
337: :label: thm-composition-kl
338: 
339: If $\mathcal{S}_t$ satisfies a hypocoercive LSI and $\mathcal{J}$ is KL-non-expansive, then:
340: 
341: $$
342: D_{\text{KL}}(\mathcal{J}(\mathcal{S}_{\Delta t}(\rho)) \| \rho_\infty) \le (1 - \alpha \Delta t) D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + O(\Delta t^2)
343: $$
hints.raw_directive:
334: **Objective**: Prove composed operator $\mathcal{J} \circ \mathcal{S}_{\Delta t}$ contracts KL.
335: 
336: :::{prf:theorem} Discrete-Time KL-Contraction for Composition
337: :label: thm-composition-kl
338: 
339: If $\mathcal{S}_t$ satisfies a hypocoercive LSI and $\mathcal{J}$ is KL-non-expansive, then:
340: 
341: $$
342: D_{\text{KL}}(\mathcal{J}(\mathcal{S}_{\Delta t}(\rho)) \| \rho_\infty) \le (1 - \alpha \Delta t) D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + O(\Delta t^2)
343: $$
